org.apache.flink.api.common.state

类 StateDescriptor<S extends State,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,T>
  • 类型参数:
    S - The type of the State objects created from this StateDescriptor.
    所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    FoldingStateDescriptor, ListStateDescriptor, ReducingStateDescriptor, ValueStateDescriptor

    @PublicEvolving
public abstract class StateDescriptor<S extends State,T>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Base class for state descriptors. A StateDescriptor is used for creating partitioned State in stateful operations. This contains the name and can create an actual state object given a StateBackend using bind(StateBackend).

    Subclasses must correctly implement equals(Object) and hashCode().

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段详细资料

      • name

        protected final String name
        Name that uniquely identifies state created from this StateDescriptor.

      • serializer

        protected TypeSerializer<T> serializer
        The serializer for the type. May be eagerly initialized in the constructor, or lazily once the type is serialized or an ExecutionConfig is provided.

      • defaultValue

        protected transient T defaultValue
        The default value returned by the state when no other value is bound to a key

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StateDescriptor

        protected StateDescriptor(String name,
                          TypeSerializer<T> serializer,
                          T defaultValue)
        Create a new StateDescriptor with the given name and the given type serializer.
        参数:
        name - The name of the StateDescriptor.
        serializer - The type serializer for the values in the state.
        defaultValue - The default value that will be set when requesting state without setting a value before.

      • StateDescriptor

        protected StateDescriptor(String name,
                          TypeInformation<T> typeInfo,
                          T defaultValue)
        Create a new StateDescriptor with the given name and the given type information.
        参数:
        name - The name of the StateDescriptor.
        typeInfo - The type information for the values in the state.
        defaultValue - The default value that will be set when requesting state without setting a value before.

      • StateDescriptor

        protected StateDescriptor(String name,
                          Class<T> type,
                          T defaultValue)
        Create a new StateDescriptor with the given name and the given type information.

        If this constructor fails (because it is not possible to describe the type via a class), consider using the StateDescriptor(String, TypeInformation, Object) constructor.

        参数:
        name - The name of the StateDescriptor.
        type - The class of the type of values in the state.
        defaultValue - The default value that will be set when requesting state without setting a value before.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name of this StateDescriptor.

      • getDefaultValue

        public T getDefaultValue()
        Returns the default value.

      • getSerializer

        public TypeSerializer<T> getSerializer()
        Returns the TypeSerializer that can be used to serialize the value in the state. Note that the serializer may initialized lazily and is only guaranteed to exist after calling initializeSerializerUnlessSet(ExecutionConfig).

      • bind

        public abstract S bind(StateBackend stateBackend)
                throws Exception
        Creates a new State on the given StateBackend.
        参数:
        stateBackend - The StateBackend on which to create the State.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • isSerializerInitialized

        public boolean isSerializerInitialized()
        Checks whether the serializer has been initialized. Serializer initialization is lazy, to allow parametrization of serializers with an ExecutionConfig via initializeSerializerUnlessSet(ExecutionConfig).
        返回:
        True if the serializers have been initialized, false otherwise.

      • initializeSerializerUnlessSet

        public void initializeSerializerUnlessSet(ExecutionConfig executionConfig)
        Initializes the serializer, unless it has been initialized before.
        参数:
        executionConfig - The execution config to use when creating the serializer.

      • hashCode

        public abstract int hashCode()
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 Object

        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 Object

        public String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Object
